backend/main.mo: Motoko backend defining types, access control mixin, rating and comment data structures, and alias generation for authenticated principals.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing feature requirements, associated files, components, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of key frontend source files describing structure, behavior, and UI patterns.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT-PRODUCTION.md: Guide detailing prerequisites and steps for deploying the frontend and backend to production on the Internet Computer.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base variables and theming definitions with light/dark mode color tokens and global element styling.
frontend/index.html: Defines the root HTML document with SEO meta tags and loads the React app entry point.
frontend/public/robots.txt: Configures crawler access, allowing all bots and specifying sitemap location and crawl delay.
frontend/public/sitemap.xml: Lists key site routes with metadata for search engines including change frequency and priority.
frontend/QA-PRELAUNCH-CHECKLIST.md: Comprehensive QA checklist covering routing, responsiveness, accessibility, motion preferences, and UI behavior before launch.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up the application's route structure using TanStack Router and loads all top-level and capability-specific pages.
frontend/src/components/AboutVisionSecti: Renders a marketing section comparing traditional AI to Forge with styled feature lists and messaging.
frontend/src/components/ActivityFeed.tsx: Displays a timed, animated activity feed with accessibility support, applying variant messages and calling onComplete when done.
frontend/src/components/AgentCard.tsx: Shows a UI card summarizing an agent’s identity, capabilities, rating, and task acceptance.
frontend/src/components/AgentSelfOnboard: Provides a UI card layout describing the agent self-onboarding contract and showing a JSON capability schema.
frontend/src/components/AiToHumanComingS: Marketing section describing future agent-to-human task routing with narrative and value framing blocks.
frontend/src/components/AuthStatus.tsx: Authentication UI showing sign-in/out controls and triggering profile setup when needed.
frontend/src/components/CommentsFeedback: Commenting widget that lists comments, allows posting new ones, and supports upvoting with identity checks.
frontend/src/components/CtaBackButton.ts: Simple back button that navigates browser history backward.
frontend/src/components/DevelopersSectio: Developer-focused marketing section explaining how to deploy agents and outlining workflow steps.
frontend/src/components/ExecutionPanel.t: Interactive execution flow panel simulating agent analysis, selection, and result display using staged phases.
frontend/src/components/FooterNote.tsx: Footer component with multi-column navigation links and branding icons.
frontend/src/components/ForgeBrandMark.t: Renders the Forge AI text logo with size-based typography and optional custom classes.
frontend/src/components/ForgeQuoteCard.t: Displays an animated inspirational quote card with decorative quote icons and a closing statement.
frontend/src/components/FullScreenNavOve: Provides a full-screen navigation menu with focus trapping, ESC handling, and body scroll lock.
frontend/src/components/GlobalHeader.tsx: Implements the global header with scroll-based styling and a hamburger-triggered full-screen menu.
frontend/src/components/HeroSection.tsx: Hero section with brand mark, headline, task input, and navigation CTAs using identity and last-task data.
frontend/src/components/home/HomeHeroVal: Layout component for homepage hero sections, organizing headline, supporting text, and actions.
frontend/src/components/home/LiveMarketp: Shows placeholder marketplace items in a grid with ratings, pricing, categories, and execution counts.
frontend/src/components/home/Marketplace: Displays a three‑step marketplace workflow: request, orchestrate, and deliver.
frontend/src/components/HomeSectionIndex: Sticky footer offering quick-scroll buttons to major homepage sections.
Reusable styled text component for emphasized impact statements with size variants.
frontend/src/components/JumpToFooter.tsx: Floating button that scrolls smoothly to a referenced footer element, respecting motion preferences.
frontend/src/components/MagicalOnboardin: Guided onboarding section presenting template prompts that navigate to the demo lab.
frontend/src/components/MarketingSection: Reusable marketing header component with title, subtitle, optional micro-statement, and children content.
frontend/src/components/MarketplaceDisco: UI for browsing templates and entering free‑form prompts, with mode toggle and navigation to a demo using selected or typed prompts.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Modal for capturing and saving a user’s name, handling profile creation via mutation with success and error toasts.
frontend/src/components/ProgressiveDiscl: Reusable collapsible section that reveals children content with animated open/close behavior.
frontend/src/components/RatingStars.tsx: Five‑star rating widget that loads existing ratings, requires auth, and submits updates with visual feedback.
frontend/src/components/ResultReveal.tsx: Animated reveal component for job results, showing metadata, deliverables, and a rating section after a timed delay.
Interactive multi‑year roadmap selector displaying milestones and descriptions with animated timeline UI.
frontend/src/components/RotatingPlacehol: Input field with rotating placeholder text unless reduced‑motion is preferred, submitting on Enter key.
frontend/src/components/TrustComplianceS: Renders a four‑item trust and compliance feature strip with icons and descriptions.
frontend/src/components/TrustedMetricsBa: Displays live platform metrics using cards with icons, values, and labels.
Centralized copy definitions for Explore and Demo Lab flows with text used across UI steps.
frontend/src/content/lexicon.ts: Defines shared terminology, preferred verbs, and reusable micro‑statements for consistent copy.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to user identity, refreshing when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAgentFirstMode.ts: Hook for toggling and persisting agent-first mode using session storage.
frontend/src/hooks/useAuthGuard.ts: Provides an authentication guard that triggers login when required.
frontend/src/hooks/useComments.ts: Hooks for fetching, adding, and upvoting comments via the backend actor with auth checks.
frontend/src/hooks/useCtaNavigation.ts: Navigation helper marking transitions as CTA-driven for UI behavior.
frontend/src/hooks/useDocumentTitle.ts: Updates document titles based on current route using predefined mappings.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for Internet Identity login, identity persistence, and login status management using Dfinity AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/usePlatformPerformanc: Generates time-based simulated platform metrics that update every 30 seconds without backend requests.
frontend/src/hooks/usePrefersReducedMoti: Detects the user's prefers-reduced-motion setting and updates when the system preference changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Wraps backend actor calls with React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user profiles, ratings, and last forged tasks.
frontend/src/hooks/useRouteMeta.ts: Maps routes to meta descriptions and Open Graph titles and updates metadata on route changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useScrollBehavior.ts: Provides smooth scroll-to-top and scroll-to-element helpers that respect reduced-motion preferences.
Restores scroll positions on browser back/forward navigation by tracking positions per route.
frontend/src/hooks/useSectionEntryMotion: Triggers section entry animations based on IntersectionObserver visibility, with reduced-motion and fallback handling.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines global Tailwind layers, theme variables, motion tokens, typography, and base styling for light and dark modes.
frontend/src/layouts/RootLayout.tsx: Provides the app’s root layout with global header/footer, background effects, scroll handling, and conditional CTA back button.
frontend/src/lib/demo/canonicalWatcherDe: Legacy wrapper that selects a template type and delegates demo generation to the template engine.
frontend/src/lib/demo/executionTemplates: Generates structured demo outputs and activity feeds for research, ops, support, and watcher workflows using template-specific logic.
frontend/src/lib/demo/promptTemplates.ts: Defines prompt templates that map user tasks to template types for research, ops, support, and watcher workflows.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Exports a utility function that merges class names using clsx and tailwind-merge.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with Internet Identity and React Query providers and loading global styles.
frontend/src/motion/sectionEntryProfiles: Defines motion profiles specifying timing, easing, and intensity for different section-entry reveal animations.
frontend/src/motion/SectionEntryReveal.t: Reusable animation wrapper that triggers section-entry reveal effects based on motion profiles and intersection visibility.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Renders the About page explaining Forge AI’s purpose, workflow, and why it runs on the Internet Computer. Contains multiple informational sections with headings, text, and feature lists.
frontend/src/pages/AgentSelfOnboardingPa: Displays the self-onboarding protocol for agents, including capability schemas, funding rules, execution guarantees, and ICP-specific benefits. Uses styled sections and icons to present the full specification.
frontend/src/pages/BuildPage.tsx: Provides an overview for developers on building autonomous agents, highlighting benefits and offering a guided getting-started section. Includes feature blocks and navigation hooks.
frontend/src/pages/DemoLabPage.tsx: Implements the interactive Demo Lab where users submit prompts, run agent tasks, and view execution output. Manages template selection, job creation, authentication, and UI state transitions.
frontend/src/pages/DevelopersPage.tsx: Shows the Developers landing page with a headline, description, and embedded DevelopersSection component. Serves as an entry point for developer resources.
frontend/src/pages/DocsPage.tsx: Renders the documentation overview page introducing Forge concepts like autonomous execution, coordination, and on-chain settlement. Uses styled content blocks with icons and descriptions.
frontend/src/pages/ExplorePage.tsx: Interactive explore page letting users enter free‑form prompts or choose predefined samples, then navigating to the demo lab with the selected prompt.
frontend/src/pages/ForgeHomePage.tsx: Home page presenting the product’s hero section, value props, credibility signals, and navigation CTAs with animated section reveals.
frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx: Login page explaining Internet Identity authentication and its benefits, displaying the AuthStatus component for sign‑in.
frontend/src/pages/marketplace/Capabilit: Explains how agents hire other agents, listing key capabilities and example workflows.
Describes human approval controls for agent workflows, including capabilities and example use cases.
Covers long-running agent workflows with persistent state, scheduling, and related example use cases.
React page describing multi-agent collaboration with explanations, capabilities, and example use cases.
React page outlining task-driven agents, their autonomous workflow abilities, and related use cases.
frontend/src/pages/MarketplacePage.tsx: Marketplace overview page describing autonomous agent coordination and showing an example multi‑agent workflow with CTAs.
frontend/src/pages/PlaybooksPage.tsx: Playbooks page outlining job request formats with human guidance and machine‑readable specs, plus examples and structured output details.
frontend/src/pages/RoadmapPage.tsx: Roadmap page displaying the product timeline and a feedback section with comments and contact info.
frontend/src/pages/SupportPage.tsx: Renders the Support page with contact info, donation address copying, and explanations of ICP and ckBTC.
frontend/src/pages/VisionPage.tsx: Displays the platform vision with detailed descriptions of autonomous agent coordination and example workflows.
frontend/src/utils/jobId.ts: Utility for generating unique jobIds and validating their format.
frontend/src/utils/rareVariants.ts: Generates deterministic rare text variants based on jobId and includes predefined variant sets.
frontend/src/utils/time.ts: Provides UTC timestamp formatting utilities in short and long forms.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Helpers for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters with sessionStorage support and hash handling.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining theme extensions, colors, spacing, animations, and plugin setup.
frontend/VERIFICATION-NOTES-PRODUCTION.m: Production deployment verification checklist capturing routing, SEO, identity, and scroll behavior validation steps.
project_state.json: Metadata describing project state, redesign goals, architectural notes, and pending homepage refactor requirements.
